properties.name: firstName
properties.summary: Name bestowed upon an individual to differentiate them from other members of a group that share a family name (for example, "Johnathan").

properties.name: lastName
properties.summary: Name bestowed upon an individual to denote membership in a group or family. (for example, "Appleseed").

properties.name: middleName
properties.summary: Secondary name bestowed upon an individual to differentiate them from others that have the same given name (for example, "Maple").

properties.name: namePrefix
properties.summary: The portion of a name's full form of address that precedes the name itself (for example, "Dr.," "Mr.," "Ms.").

properties.name: nameSuffix
properties.summary: The portion of a name's full form of address that follows the name itself (for example, "Esq.," "Jr.," "Ph.D.").

properties.name: nickname
properties.summary: Name substituted for the purposes of familiarity (for example, "Johnny").
